name: Monster Throne
description:
Monster Throne is an action RPG set in a fantasy world... where you play as the dragon!

Play as Luther, and claw your way through a vast and dangerous land. Find clues to the nature of the mysterious power that you accidentally awakened, before its dark power ends the life of the one closest to you!

This game is SFW, but includes blood, mature themes and some slightly naughty jokes.  

Updates:
I'm planning on releasing the next update in October 2022!
